NetShop ISP, a leading Cloud & VPS Hosting Provider, announced the availability of Free Trial service for VPS Servers hosted in its global Data Center locations.

Get Free VPS Trial in the following locations:

  • Cyprus
  • Malta
  • United Kingdom (UK)
  • Amsterdam, Netherlands
  • Los Angeles, United States
  • Singapore

How our Free Trial VPS service works
The VPS Trial service by NetShop ISP is completely Free, with no hidden fees, no credit card requirement and zero obligations.

To request a Free VPS for 24-48 hours please contact sales@netshop-isp.com.cy or through our Contact Form and a Sales team member will swiftly contact you with further details for your Free VPS trial service activation.

About NetShop ISP
NetShop Internet Services is an Award Winning Data Center Services Provider with privately-owned Infrastructure in Cyprus, Malta, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Singapore, Los Angeles (US West) and Hong Kong.

We offer Dedicated Servers, Cloud & VPS Hosting, Reseller Web Hosting, cPanel Web Hosting, Domain Names, SSL Certificates, Cloud Backup and E-mail Hosting.
